document_data.name: Taelunangul
document_data.mainbody: '''Taelunangul''' was the chieftain and matriarch of the [[Batiri]] [[Shattered Spear tribe]] in [[Chult]] ''circa'' [[1374 DR]].
document_data.Possessions: Taelunangul's tribe trained [[deinonychus]] [[dinosaur]]s for a watchdog use. The chieftain wore a minor [[enchanted]] decorative feathered mask â€“ a ''[[jungle headdress]]'', created by Batiri [[shaman]]s.
document_data.History: In the {{Yearlink|1374}}, Taelunangul's tribe came across the shipwreck of the ''[[Vigilant (ship)|Vigilant]]'', a vessel that belonged to [[Sa'Sani]]'s trade company. The Batiri attacked the survivors, including the infamous author [[Volothamp Geddarm]]. Some of the survivors ended up captured by Taelunangul's goblins as well as some of the ship's precious cargo. Cannibalistic Batiri consumed several survivors, with only ''Vigilant's'' Second Mate surviving long enough to be rescued by a group of mercenaries hired by Sa'Sani. Chieftain Taelunangul was killed in the process, unwilling to negotiate.
